name: Rec Room, The Offshore Firm (2021)
description:
"Rec Room"
The Offshore Firm (2021)

Metarealistic game photography depicting hypercorporate, antisocial, and liminal virtual environments. The spaces in this series were created in "The Life Stage: Virtual House," a 1993 building design simulator released for the 3DO console in Japan.

Although the game has fallen into obscurity, it is notable for it's use of photographic gameplay elements within an immersive 3D virtual space.

// Artwork by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG //
